title: Ebert & Roeper - 02.24.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  February 24th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0443274/]Vantage Point[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0848557/]Diary of the Dead[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0423977/]Charlie Bartlett[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0799934/]Be Kind Rewind[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0854678/]Taxi to the Dark Side[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0467200/]The Other Boleyn Girl[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0839980/]Semi-Pro[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0443274/]Vantage Point[/url]  -  down - down
-- Dennis Quaid - Forest Whitaker - Matthew Fox - Sigourney Weaver - William Hurt

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0848557/]Diary of the Dead[/url]  -  up - down
-- written & directed by George A. Romero - ( Night of the Living Dead - Dawn of the Dead - etc )
-- Michelle Morgan

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0423977/]Charlie Bartlett[/url]  -  (way) down - (way) down
-- Robert Downey Jr. - Anton Yelchin - Hope Davis - Kat Dennings

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0799934/]Be Kind Rewind[/url]  -  (not quite) down - up
-- Jack Black - Mos Def - Melonie Diaz - Danny Glover - Mia Farrow

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0854678/]Taxi to the Dark Side[/url]  -  UP - UP
-- documentary

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0442933/]Beowulf[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Beowulf-Robin-Wright-Penn/dp/B0011NVC98/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1203963260&sr=1-3](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0838221/]The Darjeeling Limited[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Darjeeling-Limited-Owen-Wilson/dp/B0010X8NF0/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1203963335&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0389722/]30 Days of Night[/url]  -  down - down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0455957/]Goya&#039;s Ghosts[/url]  -  hate to say it thumbs down - (way) down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0795368/]Death at a Funeral[/url]  -  big thumbs up - hated thumbs down

	---Now In Theaters
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0489099/]Jumper[/url]  -  down - down  -  ( "good looking crap" )
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0416236/]The Spiderwick Chronicles[/url]  -  (terrible thumbs) down - (mediocre effort) down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0832266/]Definitely, Maybe[/url]  -  UP - UP  -  ( "appealing, smartly put together movie..." )

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/ ]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
[url=http://www.rogerebert.com]Roger Ebert reviews[/url]
[url=http://www.suntimes.com/index/roeper.html]Richard Roeper columns[/url]
-------------------------------------------------
Various clips from Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper can be found on
Duration = approximately 20 minutes: Video = XviD - 640 x 480: Audio = MP3 192
